channel.title: Comments on: Sandra asks, “Is my computer infected?”
channel.description: Tech news worth talking about and tech help worth listening to

item.title: By: Kathy Clower
item.dc:creator: Kathy Clower
item.description: If I already have an antivirus program such as McAfee, can I still run these two programs?
item.content:encoded: If I already have an antivirus program such as McAfee, can I still run these two programs?

item.title: By: virginia
item.dc:creator: virginia
item.description: This was a wonderful This information was so helpful for me. I have run both programs on my computers and found I had a great deal of mal ware on them. Thanks so much.
item.content:encoded:
This was a wonderful This information was so helpful for me. I have run both programs on my computers and found I had a great deal of mal ware on them.
Thanks so much.
